forensics_regression_test_specs.title: [Forensics] Regression Test Specifications
forensics_regression_test_specs.instruction_raw: Analyze the 1246+ remaining forensic events in 'reports/diagnostic_refined.md'. Categorize recurring failures (M2 Supply, Bond Issuance, Saga Skips, Missing Accounts). For each category, generate a detailed specification for a regression test file (pytest) that reproduces the failure state and validates the fix. Ensure coverage for multi-tick edge cases identified in the logs.
